name: users_favorite_get
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool songmeanings.
Tool description: Easily follow and track your favorite artists on SongMeanings!
Be the first to know about new lyrics, song meanings & more!
API description: Retrieve a user's favorite items from the SongMeanings API based on the specified type.

sm_uid.description: The user ID for which to retrieve favorites.

type.description: The type of favorites to retrieve; can be 'artists' or 'lyrics'. Defaults to 'lyrics'.
